entry.title: Costa Rica Digital Nomad Visa
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:

Costa Rica Digital Nomad Visa: Eliminates the hassle of "border runs" Features one-year validity that is extendable for another year Requires proof of stable income of at least $3,000 per month or $4,000 if you are a couple or family applying together.  After 3 years, it can be changed to a permanent residency with a 3 year validity. It takes something between 3-6 months if it is applied online.

  • Allows you to open Costa Rican Bank Account
  • Import goods 
  • Use your drivers license to drive in Costa Rica
  • Consultation with Bitcoin Capitalist during process
  • Price includes all taxes and fees owed, which are considerable

Visa lasts for 12 months, and is renewable for an additional 12. 

It grants benefits such as: no income tax, no social security obligations, right to open bank accounts, right to import -tax free- work equipment and automatic convalidation of the driver license. 

The requirements are: An average income for the past 12 months of US$3000 monthly or USD$36,000 annual (if it's a couple or families the amount is USD$4000 monthly), that the job is located outside Costa Rica and to buy medical health insurance in Costa Rica.

We just need to follow this 3 SIMPLE steps:

1.Compilation stage. 7-10 days.

1.1 Send a photo of your passport with its info and stamp.

  • I will make a power of attorney and an informed consent document. You need to print, sign and send me a scan copy.
  •  I will coordinate with the notary to certify your passport (UD$40) and a translator to translate it (USD$35)

1.2.  Obtain bank statements of the past 12 months. 

  • These have to give an average income of USD$3000. If you are travelling with your married partner then the average has to be USD$4000
  • We will coordinate with an accountant, to issue a certificate of income (USD$226 VAT included)
  1. Online application for the digital nomad. 1-45 days. 

2.1 First stage: We present certain documents and the migration office will answer us in 1-30 days granting us 5 days to do the final application.

  • I need the full name of your mother and father.

2.2 Second stage: We will apply for the digital nomad and migration has to give us an answer in 1-15 days. 

  • You need to provide me the full address of your workplace and the list of functions that you do. 
  • Payments: USD$112 application fee, plus 50% of my honoraries
  1. Documentation stage: 1-90 days. 
  • After we get a resolution that approves your digital nomad Visa we will be granted with 90 days to finish the process, so in order to finish it we need to schedule an appointment to take your picture and get your ID card. 
  • Payments: 
    • For the ID Card ($128)
    • guarantee deposit ($100)
    • Show you have an insurance that covers USD$50k in medical expenses (costs around $230-300)

entry.title: Costa Rica Permanent Residency via Investment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 5000.00

Embark on an expedited path to residency in the enchanting country of Costa Rica through the Bitcoin Capitalist's exceptional expertise in residency by investment. We present you with two viable options to obtain residency:

Investor Option: By investing $150,000 in various avenues such as real estate, vehicles (excluding corporations), investment funds, or shares of an active corporation, you lay the foundation for your residency by investment journey.

Rentista Option: Simply depositing $60,000 into a Costa Rican bank account opens doors to residency in this tropical haven.

Our streamlined process involves three simple steps:

Step 1: Compilation Stage (7-10 days) During this stage, we gather the necessary documents to initiate the process swiftly. We require a clear photo of your passport, along with its information and stamp. Our team will prepare a power of attorney and an informed consent document, which you will print, sign, and send back to us. We coordinate with a notary for passport certification (USD $40) and a translator for translation (USD $35). Additionally, we assist you in obtaining your birth certificate and FBI/Royal Mounted Police criminal records, duly apostilled. Registry before the police department and your Consulate/Embassy is also facilitated. If pursuing the investor option, we gather documentation regarding the investment, or if opting for rentista, documentation related to the bank deposit.

Step 2: Online Application for Residency (1-45 days) Our team handles the online application process, which spans two stages. In the first stage, we submit the required documents to the migration office, awaiting their response within 1-30 days. We also gather information about your parents' full names. In the second stage, we apply for the residency category, with a response expected within 1-15 days. Payments during this stage include a USD $112 application fee, along with 50% of our honoraries.

Step 3: Documentation Stage (1-90 days) Upon receiving a resolution approving your digital nomad visa, you are granted 90 days to complete the process. We assist in scheduling an appointment for your picture and ID card issuance. Additional payments include $128 for the ID card and a guarantee deposit. Insurance before social security is also necessary.

With the Bitcoin Capitalist as your trusted partner, achieving residency by investment in Costa Rica becomes a streamlined and efficient journey. Experience the splendors of this tropical paradise while enjoying the benefits and opportunities that come with your new residency status.
